/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. In the distance, trees add a touch of nature to the urban environment. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
